name: Shoes on an Albanian sofa
description:
Pair, women's shoes
Tirana, Albannia
16 August 2019

The rent had not been paid since July after Luriana's last pay check. Burim had promised he'd find work, but there was little to do now in the fields, and metal scrap recycling quality controller jobs were so hard to find. Luriana had no choice but to move back to her mother's house. The furniture had to go, and so did her prized ballroom dancing shoes.

-----

The Lost Shoe Project brings together participants from around the world, in a performance piece documented in close-to-real-time as a sequence of photographic images of lost or abandoned shoes. The Collector presents this first array of his most loved images. 

https://lostshoeproject.art
